body:
This release includes:

Updated dependencies
Android Gradle 5.6
Android Gradle Plugin 3.5.0
Novoda static analysis plugin 1.0
New update dependencies plugin
OkHttp 4.1.0
Mockito 3.0.0
Delete orphan empty folders
Prevent Download Manager instantiation crash

Dependency Updates 
File Size Requesting #492
Persistent Delete Notification #508

#480 Normalise paths when building `BatchFile`
#478 Create `BatchBuilder` from `Batch`
#477 Single dismissible notification

This release contains: 

Add support for root directory: https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/475

This release contains:

#456 Swallowing events
#459 Download batch requirement rule
#460 #461 Fix lint and thresholds on local builds

#452 Migration demo fixes
#450 Use correct total file size for resume requests 
#441 HTTP Client open API
#435 Javadoc the requirement rule factory
#433 Fix the `Wait.Then`
#432 Update dependencies

This patch contains the following:

#430 Revert file size fix
#432 Update dependencies

name: Version 2
body: This is a complete rework of the novoda `download-manager`, specifically created to allow batching of downloads and support for the latest versions of android, with a simplified API.

- Adds first round of Android O support! The download service will now run in the foreground with a notification even when the app that started it is running in the background or has been swiped away. https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/237

- Adds `NotificationInitialiser` interface so client apps can build against Android O. This will be built upon in future releases. https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/238 https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/239

- Download Manager no longer inserts database entries if they contain a duplicate file URI. https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/234 This fixes https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/issues/228

- We no longer try and close `null` database cursors, because that causes `NullPointerException`s. https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/233 Big thanks to @mcroghan for this fix.

- Fixes entire batch being marked as failed when connectivity is lost;
- Fixes batch being marked as queued when a download is paused by the app/user.
(#230)

From 0.2.45:
> Downloads reconnect on network disconnections for Android N or greater Restart service on disconnection #213

name: v0.2.44
body: - FIXES BUG - Allow downloading to location returned from getExternalFilesDirs in API 19 and newer #204

name: v0.2.43
body:
- FIXES BUG - `Request.getDestinationPath()` will return an actual file path, not an `URI` representation #192
- DEPRECATES - `Request(android.net.Uri uri)` and `Request setDestinationUri(android.net.Uri uri)` in favor of `Request(java.net.URI uri)`, and `Request setDestinationUri(java.net.URI uri)` respectively #193

name: v0.2.40
body: Fixes issue where interrupted downloads would be marked as successfully completed on resume.

name: v0.2.39
body: Add new listener for DownloadManagerModules being released #182

name: v0.2.38
body: Support large files (with blocking factor of 20) in the tar resume logic.

name: v0.2.33
body:
Release notes:
- FIXES BUG - download manager deletes everything inside the application shared getCacheDir()

name: v0.2.32
body:
Includes 1 change:
- Fix broken SQL for migration path https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/commit/ba95c4f41b95975c49f7f0bff24b76024df2a66d

name: v0.2.28
body:
Includes 2 changes:
- Use the 'HIDDEN' state when hiding a notification #172
- Makes notifications uniques by setting different data on each of them #173

name: v0.2.27
body:
Includes one change:
- Uses FLAG_CANCEL_CURRENT instead of FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT for the clicks #171

name: v0.2.26
body:
Includes one change:
- Uses multiple actions for click events on notifications so they can be handled differently #170

name: v0.2.25
body:
Includes one change:
- If user clicks on a failed download then we want to hide the notification forever #169

name: v0.2.24
body:
Includes 1 change:
- Handle failed notifications so that they get dismissed and click events work #167

name: v0.2.23
body:
Includes 1 change:
- Adds a static text for downloading so that it can be overwritten #165

name: v0.2.22
body:
Includes 1 change:
- Restart stale downloads #163

name: v0.2.21
body:
This version includes 2 changes:
- Moves more notification code to package #164
- Adds more fields to the Download object and passes that to the customiser #162

name: v0.2.20
body:
Two things in this version:
- Broadcast clicks on notifications for completed downloads #160
- Sends the right values for the status in the Notification click broadcasts #160

name: v0.2.19
body:
This release consists of a single feature:
- Broadcast clicks on notifications for cancelled downloads #159

name: v0.2.18
body:
This release consists of a single feature:

#158 Track and broacast when a batch starts for the first time

name: v0.2.17
body:
This release consists of a single feature:

#157 Add a broadcast for batch failure

name: v0.2.16
body:
This release consists of a single feature:

#156 - Adds a method to exclude deleted batches from query

name: v0.2.15
body:
This release consists of a single feature:

#155 - API to customise notifications

name: v0.2.14
body:
- Adds the ability to add a completed batch to the download manager #152
- Fixes "Download Cancelled" notifications returning after being dismissed #150

name: v0.2.13
body: - Add client checks along with pause and cancel checks and speed up calls #147

name: v0.2.12
body: - Provide restart mechanism #146

name: v0.2.11
body:
- Replace ListView with RecyclerView in demos #140
- Adds missing status as a paused batch query filter #141

name: v0.2.10
body:
- Prevent pause a non running task and prevent resume a non paused task #135
- Reducing control reader query method allocations #138
- Reducing transfer object creation #134
- Simplifies logging #137
- Fix deleteBatchesForIds when multiple selectionArgs #133
- Resume downloads after loosing signal #128
- Fix concurrent downloads and memory leaks #130
- Avoid smashing the database while transferring bytes #129

name: v0.2.9
body:
## 0.2.9
- Tar truncation at download time #126

name: v0.2.8
body:
#125 don't flicker between queued and downloading statuses on a batch 
#124 fix URI notifications not being sent when resuming a download

name: v0.2.7
body:
Adds the following fix:
#122 gives paused state higher priority

name: v0.2.6
body:
Adds the following feature:
#120 Allow tar updates

name: v0.2.5
body:
#118 - FileDownloadInfo setter removal
#116 - Fix download goes to queued

name: v0.2.4
body:
#111 - Simplify query (pull out status and control) 
#112 - Better support for localization 
#114 - Add EXTRA_DATA column to Batches table 
#117 - Add LAST_MODIFIED column to Batches table

name: v0.2.3
body:
#105 - Batch sizes view
#109 - Notify batch modified after all downloads

name: v0.2.2
body:
#108 - flag to allow any file resume 
#99 - fixes to the instrumentation test build

name: v0.2.1
body: #97 Adds the ability to listen to changes to status changes only

name: v0.2.0
body:
#89 download checks against the current download
#92 simplified download info object
#95 fix for no icon being set for the notification
#96 adds ability to query for extra data (api breaking!)

name: v0.1.8
body:
- Query for batches #79
- Fix current size for batches #87
- Adds an extra column so you can pass data through the DLM #88

name: v0.1.7
body:
#86 - improves sort for live items
#83 - update tests and injection

name: v0.1.6
body:
#82 fix pause and resume
#84 performance improvements around download checks

name: v0.1.5
body:
#74 - adds ability to sort queries by liveness
#75 - calculate entire batch size

name: v0.1.4
body:
- Code cleanup #63
- Limit client knowledge of internals #59 
- Adds static analysis #72

name: v0.1.13
body:
#71 Incorrect DownloadBatch passed to rule checker
#69 splits demos
#67 batch id query error
#62 batch deletion bug
#60 replaces data structures

name: v0.1.1
body:
- Adds download batch pausing and resuming
- Adds download batch deletion
- Adds current and total size to batches

name: v0.1.0
body:
- Broadcast batch completion events #47
- Optimisation - Get full batch size in one query #49
- Optimisation - Removes unnecessary full loop #50

name: v0.0.14
body:
- Adds the CollatedDownloadInfo to the downloadrulecheck

(means you can check the total size of the batch in the can download check!)

name: v0.0.13
body:
- Introduces ability to batch downloads (braking changes): https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/43
- Fixes bug https://github.com/novoda/download-manager/pull/45 (wrong download status when is not ready to download)

name: v0.0.12 Released
body:
- allows power users to override the default database filename. see #39 
- Fixes bug #33 (incorrect notification status)

name: v0.0.9 Released
body: - allows clients to have a say if a download should go ahead or not. See (#29) You hook into this through your Application class.

name: v0.0.8 Released
body:
- Enforces passing a Context via the DownloadManagerBuilder this allows Requests created later on to not need to pass Context as a parameter. (#28)
- It will also allow us to make further refactorings behind the scenes now we haz your Context bwahaha.
- THIS IS AN API BREAKING CHANGE FOR DownloadManagerBuilder, DownloadManager and Request (see https://thechive.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/gifs_201.gif)

name: v0.0.7 Released
body:
Adds the ability to configure the maximum concurrent downloads (see #23) 
Improves performance of notification image fetching (#27)

name: v0.0.6 Released
body: #20 PERFORMANCE FIX - removes verbose logging by default, this stops extra queries and string concat's that caused unneccessary GC You can now set verbose logging on using the new DownloadManagerBuilder.withVerboseLogging() it is off by default.

name: v0.0.5 Released
body:
#16 minimises our public API
#17 Removes unused constants

name: v0.0.4 Released
body: Prefixes all resources with `dl__` , fixes but where the `app_name` for some clients would be "DownloadManager"

name: v0.0.3 Released
body: Exposes the `DownloadManager.CONTENT_URI` so clients can query however they want (for example Loaders)

name: v0.0.1.1 Released
body: Adds prefixes to all resources to avoid collisions

name: v0.0.2 Released
body: Allows selection of content provider authority using `manifestPlaceholders = [downloadAuthority: "${applicationId}"]` and class `com.novoda.downloadmanager.Authority`

name: v0.0.1 Released
body: Initial release - do not use - you will have issues with conflicting content providers if you use in more than one app (and anyone elses apps)
